name: Amunets Server Transfer - v1.0.28
description:
[b]Mod-ID[/b]: 2305969565

A server cluster solution for conan.
This mod allows switching "on the fly" between servers (in multiplayer) and maps (in singleplayer) while taking your character with you.

Discord @ https://discord.gg/a8hGAKW
Patreon @ https://www.patreon.com/sailorsat
changeNote:
2021-08-07 - v1.0.28
- added the ability to spawn in items from the cluster php. (example: get rewards for voting)
- updated cluster.php. (rotation backups, optional backups with character names; for multichar users)
- removed temporary feat fix. (no longer needed)
- optimized feat handling. (this *should* fix reliable buffer overflow issues)
- added error messages to import logic. (at least the most common ones)
author: LilMissHentai
